news.title: 英欧多国指控俄用箭毒蛙毒素杀害纳瓦尔尼
news.title0: Russia killed opposition leader Alexei Navalny using dart frog toxin, UK says
news.content: 英国及欧洲多国称，俄罗斯反对派领袖纳瓦尔尼死于一种从箭毒蛙毒素中提取的毒物，并指控克里姆林宫是唯一可能的凶手。
news.content0: Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny was killed using a poison developed from a dart frog toxin, the UK and European allies have said.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美卿鲁比奥称美欧命运交织但需变革
news.title0: Rubio says US and Europe 'belong together' despite tensions
news.content: 美国国务卿鲁比奥在慕尼黑安全会议上表示，美国不会放弃跨大西洋联盟，但批评了欧洲的移民、贸易和气候政策。
news.content0: Marco Rubio has assured European leaders the US does not plan to abandon the transatlantic alliance, saying its destiny "will always be intertwined" with the continent's.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 英首相宣布将向北极部署航母战斗群
news.title0: Britain will deploy warships to the Arctic, Starmer tells Munich Security Conference
news.content: 英国首相斯塔默宣布，今年将向北大西洋和北极地区部署以“威尔士亲王”号航母为首的航母战斗群，以展示对盟友的承诺。
news.content0: The UK will deploy a carrier strike group of warships to the Arctic this year, Keir Starmer has announced.
news.author: Sky News

news.title: 美知名演员范德比克患癌去世，医疗债务压垮家庭
news.title0: He was once a teen 'superstar'. Why did James Van Der Beek need help to pay his medical bills?
news.content: 曾主演《恋爱时代》的美国演员詹姆斯·范德比克因结直肠癌去世，其家庭因巨额医疗费用陷入困境，需众筹以避免失去住房。
news.content0: Actor James Van Der Beek seemed to be everywhere in the 1990s and 2000s. With the title role in coming-of-age teen drama Dawson's Creek, he walked some of the industry's hottest red carpets, and his face plastered magazine covers - one even dubbing him a "new superstar".
news.author: BBC

news.title: 古巴因美国封锁燃料短缺，年度雪茄节被迫取消
news.title0: Cuban cigar festival called off as US blockade worsens energy crisis
news.content: 由于美国石油封锁导致燃料严重短缺，古巴首都哈瓦那的年度雪茄节被迫无限期推迟，成为经济危机的最新受害者。
news.content0: An annual cigar festival in Cuban capital Havana has become the latest casualty of a fuel shortage caused by a US oil blockade.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 罗比与埃洛迪宣传期亲密互动引粉丝反感
news.title0: Why Margot Robbie and Jacob Elordi's 'mutual obsession' is giving some fans the ick
news.content: 玛格特·罗比与雅各布·埃洛迪在宣传新片《呼啸山庄》期间互动亲密，引发炒作恋情传闻的质疑，部分粉丝表示反感。
news.content0: The press trail for the new Wuthering Heights film has been a cocktail of flirtatious looks, Valentine's Day roses and "mutual obsession" for leads Margot Robbie and Jacob Elordi.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 巴西家庭实践多伴侣关系引关注
news.title0: Love Without Limits: Brazil Flirts With Polyamory
news.content: 巴西一个家庭公开实践多伴侣关系，多名伴侣共同生活并抚养孩子，反映了该国社会对非传统关系模式的日益开放。
news.content0: The toddler, still sleepy, wobbled into the kitchen and planted a kiss on the woman helping make breakfast. Her parents followed her and also planted a kiss on the lips of the woman, one of their lovers.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 英国女子假肢被海浪卷走，近一年后奇迹寻回
news.title0: The Sea Took Her Prosthetic Leg. Months Later, It Gave It Back.
news.content: 英国一名女子在海边游泳时，其防水钛合金假肢被海浪卷走。近一年后，该假肢竟被冲回岸边，奇迹般失而复得。
news.content0: The last time Brenda Ogden saw her leg — her waterproof, titanium, prosthetic leg — waves were sweeping it away.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 苏格兰精酿啤酒巨头BrewDog寻求出售
news.title0: BrewDog owners call time on craft beer pioneer
news.content: 苏格兰知名精酿啤酒商BrewDog已聘请顾问筹备出售事宜，此举可能导致这家标志性企业被拆分。
news.content0: BrewDog, the leading independent craft brewer behind brands including Punk IPA and Elvis Juice, has called in advisers to oversee a sale that could trigger a break-up of one of Scotland's best-known businesses.
news.author: Sky News
